title: MBTI Compatibility Test
description: Which MBTI type is most compatible with yours? Find out through 10 scenarios!

questions.question: When planning a weekend date, you:

choices.text: Decide based on the mood that day
Have deep conversations with close friends

questions.question: When conflicts arise with your partner:

choices.text: Based on actual reviews and information

questions.question: When do you feel energized by your partner?
When listening to your partner's worries:
What's most important in a relationship?

results.title: Enthusiastic Campaigner ENFP
results.description: The type most compatible with you is ENFP! Passionate and creative, ENFPs are partners you can share new experiences with and enjoy deep conversations. You'll have a relationship where you support each other's ideas and help each other grow.
results.advice: Pay attention to practical matters together to find balance.

results.title: Insightful Advocate INFJ
results.description: The type most compatible with you is INFJ! With deep insight and consideration, INFJs provide genuine understanding and emotional connection. You'll have a meaningful relationship where you understand each other's inner selves and grow together.
results.advice: Sometimes take time to enjoy things lightly.

results.title: Debate-Loving Debater ENTP
results.description: The type most compatible with you is ENTP! Intellectually curious ENTPs are partners you can have interesting debates and share new ideas with. You'll have a relationship where you stimulate and grow each other.

results.title: Strategic Architect INTJ
results.description: The type most compatible with you is INTJ! Goal-oriented and deep-thinking INTJs are partners you can plan the future with and grow together. You'll have a relationship where you respect each other's independence and develop.

results.title: Warm Consul ESFJ
results.description: The type most compatible with you is ESFJ! Warm and dedicated ESFJs provide a stable relationship. You'll have a warm relationship where you take care of and consider each other.
results.advice: Respect each other's personal time too.

results.title: Free-Spirited Adventurer ISFP
results.description: The type most compatible with you is ISFP! Emotional and free-spirited ISFPs are partners you can share beauty with and enjoy the present moment. You'll have a relationship where you respect each other's individuality.

results.title: Responsible Executive ESTJ
results.description: The type most compatible with you is ESTJ! Reliable and responsible ESTJs provide a stable relationship. You'll have a dependable relationship where you achieve goals together.

results.title: Exploring Virtuoso ISTP
results.description: The type most compatible with you is ISTP! Independent and practical ISTPs provide a free and realistic relationship. You'll have a relationship where you respect each other's space and grow together.
results.advice: Expressing feelings is important too. Share your heart.
